headline: Tepper’s Appaloosa Raises Stake in UnitedHealth, Adds Intel
summary: David Tepper’s Appaloosa snapped up shares of  UnitedHealth  Group during the second quarter and took new stakes in Intel and other stocks, according to a regulatory filing.  The investment manager increased Appaloosa’s UnitedHealth holdings to 2.45 million shares, up from 180,000 shares in the first quarter.  The latest stake, as of the end of June, was reported to be $764 million.

headline: Airfare Growth Accelerates for July Bookings, Led by American Airlines, UBS Data Show
summary: Annual fare growth of several US airlines accelerated in July from June, suggesting an improving rev
